languages.text: "Прекрати. Ты не можешь верить в подобное, элантах. Слова утешения мне не нужны — слова этих мон-кай не трогают мою душу. Лишь твои мысли имеют значение. Твои и мои".
"Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."
languages.original_text: "Прекрати. Ты не можешь верить в подобное, элантах. Слова утешения мне не нужны — слова этих мон-кай не трогают мою душу. Лишь твои мысли имеют значение. Твои и мои".

traits.locale_text: "Stop it. You cannot be of the same mind, elantach. I don't need the words of consolation — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Stop it. You cannot be of the same mind, elantach. I don't need the words of consolation — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “别再说了。或许你不相信，外界人，但我并不需要你的安慰。这些猴子的恶言恶语触动不了我的灵魂，我只在乎你的想法。你的想法，和我自己的想法。”
languages.original_text: "Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."

traits.locale_text: “别再说了。或许你不相信，外界人，但我并不需要你的安慰。这些猴子的恶言恶语触动不了我的灵魂，我只在乎你的想法。你的想法，和我自己的想法。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Basta. No me digas que crees eso, elantach. No necesito palabras de consuelo; los improperios de esos mon-keigh no pueden tocar mi alma. Solo me importan tus pensamientos. Los tuyos y los míos».
languages.original_text: "Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."

traits.locale_text: «Basta. No me digas que crees eso, elantach. No necesito palabras de consuelo; los improperios de esos mon-keigh no pueden tocar mi alma. Solo me importan tus pensamientos. Los tuyos y los míos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Arrêtez. Vous savez que c'est faux, elantach. Je n'ai pas besoin de vos mots de réconfort. Les paroles de ces mon-keigh ne m'ont pas blessée. Seule votre opinion compte à mes yeux. Je ne me soucie que de vous et moi. »
languages.original_text: "Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."

traits.locale_text: « Arrêtez. Vous savez que c'est faux, elantach. Je n'ai pas besoin de vos mots de réconfort. Les paroles de ces mon-keigh ne m'ont pas blessée. Seule votre opinion compte à mes yeux. Je ne me soucie que de vous et moi. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hört auf! Das könnt Ihr nicht wirklich glauben, Elantach. Ich brauche keine Worte des Trosts – was diese Chem-Pan-Sey sagen, erreicht meine Seele nicht. Nur Eure Gedanken zählen. Eure und meine."
languages.original_text: "Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."

traits.locale_text: "Hört auf! Das könnt Ihr nicht wirklich glauben, Elantach. Ich brauche keine Worte des Trosts – was diese Chem-Pan-Sey sagen, erreicht meine Seele nicht. Nur Eure Gedanken zählen. Eure und meine."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「やめてくれ。エランタ、お前にはそんなことは信じられない。慰めの言葉などいらない。モン＝ケイの言葉など、我の魂には響かない。大事なのはお前の考えだ。お前と我自身の」
languages.original_text: "Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."

traits.locale_text: 「やめてくれ。エランタ、お前にはそんなことは信じられない。慰めの言葉などいらない。モン＝ケイの言葉など、我の魂には響かない。大事なのはお前の考えだ。お前と我自身の」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yapma. Buna inanıyor olamazsın elantach. Rahatlatıcı sözlere ihtiyacım yok. Bu mon-keighlerin sözleri, ruhuma dokunmuyor. Sadece senin düşüncelerin önemli. Senin ve benim düşüncelerim."
languages.original_text: "Stop it. You cannot believe that, elantach. I do not need words of comfort — the words of these mon-keigh do not touch my soul. Only your thoughts matter. Yours and mine."

traits.locale_text: "Yapma. Buna inanıyor olamazsın elantach. Rahatlatıcı sözlere ihtiyacım yok. Bu mon-keighlerin sözleri ruhuma dokunmuyor. Sadece senin düşüncelerin önemli. Senin ve benim düşüncelerim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
